foods.name: Margherita Pizza
foods.description: Classic Italian pizza topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil leaves.

foods.name: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
foods.description: Creamy pasta dish made with fettuccine, grilled chicken, and Alfredo sauce.

foods.name: Caesar Salad
foods.description: Classic Caesar salad made with romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.

foods.name: Hamburger
foods.description: Juicy beef patty served on a bun with lettuce, tomato, onion, and pickles.

foods.name: Sushi Roll
foods.description: Assorted sushi rolls including California roll, spicy tuna roll, and salmon avocado roll.

foods.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
foods.description: Indian curry dish made with grilled chicken, tomatoes, onions, and creamy sauce.

foods.name: Caprese Salad
foods.description: Fresh salad made with tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, basil, olive oil, and balsamic glaze.

foods.name: Pad Thai
foods.description: Thai stir-fried noodles with tofu, shrimp, peanuts, and vegetables.

foods.name: Margherita Panini
foods.description: Grilled panini sandwich filled with tomato, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil leaves.

foods.name: Mango Sticky Rice
foods.description: Traditional Thai dessert made with sticky rice, fresh mango slices, and coconut milk.

foods.name: Pho
foods.description: Vietnamese noodle soup with beef or chicken, rice noodles, herbs, and spices.

foods.name: Margherita Flatbread
foods.description: Thin-crust flatbread topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil leaves.

foods.name: Chicken Quesadilla
foods.description: Mexican dish made with tortillas, grilled chicken, cheese, and served with salsa and sour cream.

foods.name: Fruit Smoothie Bowl
foods.description: Healthy breakfast bowl made with blended fruit smoothie topped with granola, fruits, and nuts.

foods.name: Margherita Calzone
foods.description: Folded pizza dough filled with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil leaves.

foods.name: Pancakes with Maple Syrup
foods.description: Fluffy pancakes served with butter and drizzled with maple syrup.

foods.name: Garden Salad
foods.description: Fresh salad made with mixed greens, tomatoes, cucumber, carrots, and choice of dressing.

foods.name: Chicken Teriyaki Bowl
foods.description: Japanese rice bowl topped with grilled chicken, teriyaki sauce, and steamed vegetables.

foods.name: Avocado Toast
foods.description: Sliced avocado on toasted bread, drizzled with olive oil and sprinkled with salt and pepper.

foods.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
foods.description: Classic homemade cookies made with chocolate chips, butter, flour, and sugar.
